name: Yoon-Joon Lee
content: Lee, Yoon Joon Lee, YoonJoonPh.D., ProfessorDatabase laboratoryDivision of Computer ScienceKorea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology Profile |   Projects |   Publications |   Courses |   Working Contact Information e-mail : yoonjoon.lee@kaist.ac.kr phone : +82-42-869-3523 fax : +82-42-869-3510 address : Dept. of Computer Science, Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology (KAIST)373-1 Guseong-dong, Yuseong-gu, DAEJEON, Rep of KOREA Education 1983 : INPG-ENIMAG(France). Ph.D. 1979 : Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology. M.S. 1977 : Seoul National University. B.S. Career 1984.3 ~ : Professor, CSD, KAIST 2004.9 ~ 2006.8: Head, CSD, KAIST 2001.7 ~ 2003.6 : Director, Digital Science Library, KAIST 1999.6 ~ 2001.2 : Director, IT Div., KOSEF 1997.8 ~ 1998.1 : Senior Software Engineer, Cyber Database Solutions Inc. 1996.12 ~ 1997.7 : Senior Software Engineer, UniSQL Inc. 1989.10 ~ 1990.6 : Visiting Scholar, LORIA 1989.7 ~ 1989.9 : Visiting Consultant, MCC 1981.9 ~ 1983.10 : Research Staff, IMAG(France) 1979.3 ~ 1979.8 : Teaching Assistant, CSD, KAIST
